arts.ttl: Wasteful Atalanta held to goalless draw by Slavia Prague
arts.sum: Atalanta take 22 shots but fail to convert any of them into goals as a resilient Slavia Prague side leave Bergamo with a 0-0 draw, in the league phase of the UEFA Champions League.

arts.sum: Atalanta can extend their undefeated streak to six on October 22nd, as Ivan Juric’s side welcome Slavia Prague in the Champions League and Gianluca Scamacca could return to the starting lineup.
